name: Reality Is Layers
description:
Reality Is Layers.

A first-person trip through a mysterious virtual world with platforming and puzzles. What lies beyond the base layer? Venture forward to find out.

This game is by a two-person team, Fonics and Chipper. Visit my itch page for the other game jam games made by us, other links are below.

Fonics -

Artstation page - https://www.artstation.com/fonics

Chipper-

Bandcamp - https://chipper1.bandcamp.com/

This is the culmination of our game development experience so far. This jam has been amazing and this game is a personal achievement for both of us. We sincerely hope you enjoy it.

How to Play:

WASD to move. Mouse to look around. Space to Jump. Press 'E' to interact with the computer. The program will teach you the rest. 

Known Issues -

Not recommended to play on lower than a 1080p resolution monitor, as 720p and below makes it difficult to read text on the computer.

Playing with a controller plugged in may cause issues with some interactions, I highly recommend unplugging all ps4 and Xbox controllers before playing.
